name: Lightweight Backpack
description: Ultra-light yet durable travel backpack with multiple compartments, waterproof material, and padded laptop sleeve.

name: Portable Water Filter
description: Compact water filter bottle that removes 99.9% of waterborne pathogens. Essential for hiking and international travel.

name: Compact Camera
description: Lightweight travel camera with 20MP sensor, 30x optical zoom, and 4K video recording. Capture your adventures in style.

name: Digital Luggage Scale
description: Portable digital luggage scale with 110lb capacity. Avoid overweight baggage fees with this compact travel essential.
